text: â€œKodi wamuona amene wachichita chilakolako chake kukhala mulungu wake wompembedza? Ndipo Allah wamlekelera kuti asokere, kupyolera mkudziwa Kwake; ndipo wamdinda (chidindo) mmakutu mwake ndi mu mtima mwake ndi kumuika chivindikiro mmaso mwake. Choncho ndani angamuongole pambuyo pa Allah? Kodi simukumbukira
